#summary Guides to create a new theme.

===How to create a new theme?===
All the themes that come with the release are placed under [http://java-syntax-highlighter.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/javadoc/syntaxhighlighter/theme/package-summary.html syntaxhighligther.theme] package. All themes should extends the [http://java-syntax-highlighter.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/javadoc/syntaxhighlighter/Theme.html syntaxhighligther.Theme] class. You can take a look at [http://java-syntax-highlighter.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/javadoc/syntaxhighlighter/theme/ThemeDefault.html syntaxhighlighter.theme.ThemeDefault] to see what should be set to make a new theme.
